p: From a more basic virology perspective two publications addressed interactions between the viral envelope proteins and the host cell. Tiwarekar et al. identified competitive interactions between the host protein KDELR2, MeV F and H proteins, and molecular chaperones involved in endoplasmic reticulum processing [ 8]. Separately, research from my lab identified that morbillivirus H proteins are a target for the host-cell interferon stimulated protein BST2/tetherin [ 9].
